channel.title: Need help with running server on vps
channel.description:
I just bought a vps server. I patched everything, but when I trying to turn on my server I get this error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.awt.HeadlessException: No X11 DISPLAY variable was set, but this program performed an operation which requires it. at java.applet.Applet.<init>(Applet.java:50) at Server.<init>(Server.java:30) at Server.main(Server.java:34)[/code]

item.title: Need help with running server on vps
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Did you upload your server, then used remote desktop to connect to VPS and downloaded it, and runned?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with running server on vps
